name: Magnolia Writing Contest
description:
You, an aspiring writer, have 7 days to finish your entry to the Magnolia Writing Contest! Juggle between homework and drawing and actually writing! Make sure you don't run out of time!

Also, the clock is at the top of the screen, sorry if it's not very obvious

The game doesn't restart so if you want to replay it again you'll have to refresh the page

How to play: 

Use the mouse to click on dialogue choices or on objects to trigger them

Everything made by me

Known bugs: 
-Dialogue panel goes away after you click on something
-The game doesn't restart
